basic.floral_language:
Anisodontea capensis
Floriography: gentle, pure, beautiful 
Anisodontea capensis is a hardy deciduous shrub. Leaf shape is nearly the diamond, and with wavy sawtooth on leaf edges. Flower is bell shape, with single or double petal. Color is pure and fresh quietly elegant. Color includes white, pink, lavender, etc. Hibiscus syriacus is used as a hedge, hedge or garden ornament and indoor plants. 
Anisodontea capensis like plenty of sunshine, a little resistance to shade. Flowering from July to October, with ornamental period, for 2-3 weeks at a time.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-November, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, every 10-15 days apply fertilizers once , except winter
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
